text: Pharmacy orders are made via WhatsApp and available 24/7.
Delivery starts from 30 minutes depending on location.
Cash is not accepted for pharmacy delivery.
We deliver to areas including: Canggu, Seminyak, Ubud, Sanur, Denpasar, Kerobokan, Uluwatu, Nusa Dua, Pererenan, Umalas, SCBD, Kemang, and Pondok Indah.
